definition: to flee/to scuttle/to exile or banish/to amend or edit
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]

sentences.english: Electric current rising from the ground into the leader quickly vaporizes the wire.
sentences.chinese: 而自地面竄升進入導閃的電流，會快速將導線汽化。

sentences.english: I grabbed the dashboard to brace myself and I watched the speedometer climb.
sentences.chinese: 我撐住儀表板去穩住自己，同時我看到速度表在竄升。
